title: A Witch's Welcome
description: The second book of the Swamp Witch Series, the story continues. Dan Rawlings, an investigative journalist has joined forces with the unusual people who live in those swamps.An awakening of an old and evil foe threatens all supernatural creatures. A distress call is sent out and you won't believe who answers that call. Humans, Supernaturals and many others too weird to describe are embroiled in a battle to save their way of life.This book is full of adventure, mythical creatures, love and romance and painful loss. You will love the characters and the twists and turns they take to band together in a united front for survival.
author: Sonia Taylor Brock
